channel.title: CVE Feed for SonicWall -- Connect Tunnel
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SonicWall -- Connect Tunnel

item.title: CVE-2024-45315|2024-10-11T15:22:44.897Z -- sonicwall -- connect%20tunnel
item.description: The Improper link resolution before file access ('Link Following') vulnerability in SonicWall Connect Tunnel (version 12.4.3.271 and earlier of Windows client) allows users with standard privileges to create arbitrary folders and files, potentially leading to local Denial of Service (DoS) attack.

item.title: CVE-2024-45316|2024-10-11T15:38:20.692Z -- sonicwall -- connect%20tunnel
item.description: The Improper link resolution before file access ('Link Following') vulnerability in SonicWall Connect Tunnel (version 12.4.3.271 and earlier of Windows client) allows users with standard privileges to delete arbitrary folders and files, potentially leading to local privilege escalation attack.
